EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to notify CART Coordinator when Order is Cancelled
EmailTemplate.name: Notify CAR-T Coordinator When Order is Cancelled
EmailTemplate.subject: {!$Label.ProductName} - Apheresis Pick-Up Date Cancelled for {!Order__c.PatientID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!Order__c.Coordinator__c} The Apheresis Pick-Up Date for your patient with Patient ID: {!Order__c.PatientID__c} has been cancelled Please login to the portal to access the patientâ€™s record. If you did not place this request, please reach out to us via +1-XXX-XXX-XXXX. Thank You,
